translation.fr: - J'y crois pas. - Ne fais pas ça, reviens.

translation.en: Shut up! [Liv] Sydney, come back.
[Chuck] Yeah! There you go.
[Liv] You don't have to do it. [Wes] Take your time, Syd. Don't look down.
translation.fr: - T'es pas forcée de le faire. - Doucement, ne regarde pas.

translation.en: [Liv] It's just a stupid game!
[Wes] Come on, we're right here. You could always turn back, Syd.
translation.fr: On est là. Tu peux revenir, Syd.

translation.en: -[Liv] JP, grab her. -Come on, you gotta film.
translation.fr: On est là. Tu peux revenir, Syd. Allez, tu dois filmer.

translation.en: Sydney, it's not gonna count unless you film it.
translation.fr: Ça ne comptera pas si tu ne filmes pas.

translation.en: [Wes] Don't worry about the phone.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas pour ça.

translation.en: [Chuck] She has to film it! She can't...
It doesn't count unless she films it. She has to film it.
translation.fr: Ça ne compte pas si elle ne le filme pas.

translation.en: [Liv] Just bail. Just come back.
translation.fr: - Arrête et reviens. - Elle doit filmer.

translation.en: [Chuck] She has to film it. No, but she has to film it.
translation.fr: - Non, elle doit filmer. - Ta gueule, Chuck.

translation.en: -[Wes] Shut up, Chuck! -Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
translation.fr: - Non, elle doit filmer. - Ta gueule, Chuck. Oh, mon Dieu.

translation.en: [breathing heavily] I can't! Oh, my God, I can't, I can't!
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas le faire.

translation.en: [Chuck] Sydney, you gotta get up.
-You gotta do something. -Stop yelling at me!
translation.fr: Sydney, relève-toi, fais quelque chose. Arrête de me crier dessus ! Ça n'aide pas.

translation.en: -Stop! You're not helping. -[Wes] Chuck, shut up! Shut up, she's got it.
translation.fr: Arrête de me crier dessus ! Ça n'aide pas.

translation.en: [Chuck] She has to get it done!
[woman 1] Shut up!
Syd, it's gonna take too long, you gotta stand, you gotta walk.
translation.fr: Ça va prendre trop longtemps. Lève-toi et marche.

translation.en: [Liv] No, don't stand, Sydney.
translation.fr: Il faut que tu te lèves.

translation.en: Shut up! Shut up, Chuck!
[Wes] You heard her, Chuck, shut up.
[Chuck] She's gotta get it done.
She's not gonna get here in time unless you get up and walk.
translation.fr: Elle n'y arrivera pas à moins de marcher.

translation.en: You have to walk. [Wes] Don't listen to him, Syd, you got it.
[Chuck] She has to! She's wasting time!
Shut up, both of you!
[Wes] You got it. Come on, Syd, you got this.
translation.fr: Allez, Syd, tu vas y arriver.

translation.en: [Sydney] I can't, I can't, I can't. I bail, I bail, I bail.
[male computer] You bail.
[male computer] You fail.
translation.fr: - Tu as raté. - Aidez-le à sortir.

translation.en: [male computer] You fail.
This is so dumb.
Come here! Hold on! [male computer] You fail.
[male cop] Get over here!
-Hi. -[Vee] Hi! Oh, my gosh. You guys are so famous right now.
translation.fr: Salut. Vous êtes super célèbres maintenant.

translation.en: Uh-oh! Wait until Syd sees you.
translation.fr: Salut. Vous êtes super célèbres maintenant. Attends que Syd voie ça.

translation.en: But where is she? Oh, you guys don't know?
translation.fr: - Elle est où ? - Vous ne le savez pas ?

translation.en: Yeah, she tried to walk across that ladder and just bailed. So she's outta the game?
translation.fr: Elle a essayé de traverser sur l'échelle, mais a abandonné.

translation.en: Hey, let's get a drink.
translation.fr: - Elle est éliminée ? - Viens prendre un verre.

translation.en: Yeah. It wasn't pretty.
[Vee] Have you seen Sydney? -In there. -Syd?
Oh, come on, Vee, you never even spoke to him.
translation.fr: C'est bon, tu ne lui as jamais parlé.

translation.en: It's fine. Certainly, no surprise.
translation.fr: C'est rien, ça ne me surprend pas.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it's not a surprise. You know what's not fine, though?
translation.fr: Ça ne te surprend pas, mais tu sais ce qui est lamentable ?

translation.en: I almost died tonight, Vee, and you were nowhere to be found.
translation.fr: J'ai failli mourir, ce soir, et tu n'étais pas là.

translation.en: I'm sorry. When you said I should live my life,
translation.fr: Quand tu m'as dit de vivre ma vie,

translation.en: did you mean I should live my life in your shadow?
translation.fr: tu voulais dire dans ton ombre ?

translation.en: I was just trying to help you, Vee, because you're the most repressed person that I know.
translation.fr: J'essayais de t'essayer, parce que tu es trop coincée.

translation.en: Well, isn't that why you keep me around? Because I never tell you the truth?
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que tu traînes avec moi ? Parce que je te cache la vérité.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Vee] Come on, let's go.
I guess you don't tell me the truth.
Because you never told me about how insecure I am.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'as jamais dit que j'étais mal dans ma peau.

translation.en: Or about how I just have a revolving door of guys all the time.
You never tell me that, but you've told everyone that tonight.
translation.fr: TERMINE LE PARI DE SYDNEY Tu ne me l'as jamais dit, mais tu l'as dit à tout le monde ce soir.

translation.en: So please, Vee, go right ahead and show us all
what a fiery little spark plug you've become since lunch.
translation.fr: la meuf déchaînée que tu es devenue depuis le déjeuner.

translation.en: Let's go.
Shots fired.
Don't walk away from me. Vee! Wake up!
translation.fr: Ne t'en vas pas. Réveille-toi, c'est un jeu.

translation.en: This is a game.
Do you really think that someone like him is actually gonna be with you when this is all done?
translation.fr: Tu crois qu'un mec comme lui va rester avec toi quand ce sera fini ?

translation.en: Hey, you don't know me.
-Oh, I'm sorry. You really like her now? -[Ian] Yeah, I do.
All right, come on, Syd, you're just drunk.
Tommy, it is time to get over her!
translation.fr: Arrête, Syd, t'as trop bu. Tommy, il serait temps de l'oublier.

translation.en: Clearly, she has traded up!
translation.fr: Elle a trouvé mieux que toi.

translation.en: Why do you have to be such a bitch?
[Sydney] Look at that! Little Vee finally speaking her mind.
translation.fr: Tiens, la petite Vee exprime enfin ce qu'elle pense.

translation.en: Come on! Unburden yourself!
Do you know why we're best friends?
translation.fr: Tu sais pourquoi on est amies ?

translation.en: I do whatever you want all the time.
translation.fr: Je fais toujours ce que tu veux.

translation.en: No, Vee, we're friends
translation.fr: Non, Vee. On est amies, parce que je suis fun et que tu es chiante.

translation.en: because I'm fun and you're boring.
translation.fr: On est amies, parce que je suis fun et que tu es chiante.

translation.en: The only fun thing about you was your brother.
[Sydney] What is it you think?
That playing Nerve is just gonna magically make you a different person?
translation.fr: Que Nerve va te transformer comme par magie ?

translation.en: That's not how life works. You'll never be a Player.
translation.fr: Faut pas rêver ! Tu ne seras jamais une joueuse.

translation.en: You're right.
I know how much you love living in the moment, Syd.
translation.fr: Tu aimes vivre dans le présent.

translation.en: Well, remember this moment.
Because you're one of those girls who peaks in high school.
translation.fr: tu seras une de ces filles qui n'a eu de succès qu'au lycée.

translation.en: And when you wake up one day, still living in Staten Island,
translation.fr: Tu vas te réveiller un jour, toujours à Staten Island,

translation.en: still screwing the same guys,
translation.fr: à te taper les mêmes mecs

translation.en: wondering what the hell happened to your life.
translation.fr: et à te demander ce que tu as fait de ta vie.

translation.en: If you wanna know where I am from now on,
translation.fr: Si tu veux savoir où je suis,

translation.en: sign up and watch me.
[Ian] Wait, Vee, what are you doing?
Hey, Vee, you don't need to do this.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas forcée de faire ça.

translation.en: Look at me. Come on. Let's just go, let's bail, all right? What do you have to prove?
translation.fr: Regarde-moi, rentrons. Tu n'as rien à prouver.

translation.en: Come on, please. Let's go.
[Chuck] Come on, you got it, Vee, please!
[girl 1] Go, girl! [girl 2] Vee!
[Liv] Oh, my God. Vee!
That's how you get into first, Vee!
That was messed up. I can't deal with this right now. I'm gonna go.
translation.fr: - Tu as exagéré. - C'est bon, je m'en vais.

translation.en: Vee, did you know that he's played Nerve before? What?
translation.fr: - Tu sais qu'il a déjà joué ? - Quoi ?

translation.en: Yeah, it was his dare to get you here and fight with Syd.
translation.fr: Il devait te pousser à te battre avec Syd.

translation.en: That's why he brought you here.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'il t'a amenée ici.

translation.en: Look.
translation.fr: AMÈNE VEE À SE BATTRE AVEC SYDNEY

translation.en: You still trust him?
-Vee, wait. Wait. -Is it true?
Is what true?
Did you take me here as part of the game?
translation.fr: Tu m'as fait venir pour le jeu ?

translation.en: -[door opens] -Answer me! Is it true?
What are you doing?
It's more complicated than that.
I just lost my two best friends tonight.
translation.fr: J'ai perdu mes deux meilleurs amis.

translation.en: How much did you get for that?
translation.fr: - Je sais. - Combien t'as reçu pour ça ?

translation.en: No, no, it's not about the money, all right?
But I promise I'll explain everything later.
Just don't even bother, okay? I mean, Sydney almost died tonight.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas la peine. Sydney a failli mourir ce soir.

translation.en: -I almost died tonight. -Vee, I know, I know.
This game is sick. I'm going to the police.
translation.fr: Ce jeu est malsain. Je vais prévenir la police.

translation.en: Wait, no, no! No!
-I'm sorry, Vee... -What are you doing?
I'm sorry, you can't do that, all right? You can't go to the police.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas prévenir la police.

translation.en: Why not? Because I'll lose the game?
No, it's not about that! Vee! Vee!
translation.fr: Non, il ne s'agit pas de ça.

translation.en: You can't go to the police. It's the last thing you wanna do.
translation.fr: Ne préviens pas la police. Ce serait pire que tout.

translation.en: Vee, wait, I wasn't trying to hurt you. It just got outta control.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas te faire de mal, les choses ont dérapé.

translation.en: Move! Get out of the way!
Officer!
Officer! Officer, I need help. I'm...
I'm playing this game. It's called Nerve.
translation.fr: Je joue à un jeu qui s'appelle Nerve.

translation.en: And I'm worried that someone's gonna get really hurt. [man] Uh-oh.
translation.fr: Et j'ai peur que quelqu'un se blesse.

translation.en: Snitch!
A game? They playin', too?
translation.fr: Ils jouent aussi à ce jeu ?

translation.en: [Vee] Yeah, yeah.
translation.fr: Ils jouent aussi à ce jeu ? Tire-toi de là.

translation.en: There's a crime being committed?
translation.fr: Est-ce qu'un crime a été commis ?

translation.en: No, but a kid could die tonight.
translation.fr: Non, mais quelqu'un pourrait mourir ce soir.

translation.en: Look, here, it's all on my phone. You can see.
What? What?
[all] Snitch!
[Nancy] Honey, what's going on? Mom!
[Nancy] Vee, where are you?
All the money is missing from our account!
translation.fr: Notre compte en banque a été vidé.

translation.en: Wait, what? Vee, honey, are you in trouble?
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Vee, tu as des ennuis ?

translation.en: Can you just, please, tell me what's going on?
Okay, Mom, I'm gonna fix this, I promise.
[Nancy] Fix what?
Hello? Vee!
-Hello? Vee! Fix what? -I'm sorry, but I gotta win this game.
[male computer] Hello, Vee.
You broke the rules. You are our prisoner.
translation.fr: Tu as brisé les règles, tu nous appartiens.

translation.en: We told you not to snitch.
Now we control your life.
We control your family.
We control your future.
The only way out is to win the final round.
translation.fr: Tu dois remporter la finale si tu veux te libérer.

translation.en: Go to the Staten Island Ferry and the Watchers will find you.
translation.fr: Prends le ferry de Staten Island, les voyeurs t'y rejoindront.

translation.en: -See you in the finals. -[grunting] See you in the finals. See you in the finals.
translation.fr: On se revoit à la finale…

translation.en: [man] Checkin' over here.
I'm comin' for you, Vee!
Vee, thank God! Are you okay?
Am I okay? No, I'm not okay!
translation.fr: Si je vais bien ? Pas du tout.

translation.en: You need to tell me everything. Okay, what the hell is going on?
translation.fr: Dis-moi toute la vérité. - Qu'est-ce qui se passe ? - Viens là.

translation.en: -Come here, come here. -Why is this happening to me?
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce qui se passe ? - Viens là. Pourquoi est-ce que ça m'arrive ?

translation.en: 'Kay, that guy Ty. We both played Nerve last year in Seattle.
translation.fr: J'ai joué avec l'autre mec, Ty, l'an dernier à Seattle.

translation.en: We got a dare to hang from a construction crane 200 feet in the air.
translation.fr: On devait s'accrocher à une grue à 60 mètres du sol.

translation.en: The two of us and this kid named Robbie.
translation.fr: Nous deux, et un autre mec appelé Robby.

translation.en: [Robbie] Five! Four! Three!
translation.fr: - Cinq, quatre, trois… - Allez, ça suffit.

translation.en: [Ian] Come on, Robbie, that's enough. [Ty] Shit, he's slipping.
translation.fr: - Cinq, quatre, trois… - Allez, ça suffit. - Merde, il glisse. - …deux, un !

translation.en: [Robbie] Two! One! [Ty] Climb back up, man.
[Ty] Ian, grab him. [Ian] Grab my hand!
Ty and I, we bailed and we went to the cops.
translation.fr: On s'est tiré et on a prévenu les flics.

translation.en: We tried to get the game shut down, but they didn't do anything.
translation.fr: On a essayé d'interdire le jeu, mais ils n'ont rien fait.

translation.en: No, they just called it an accident.
translation.fr: Ils ont dit que c'était un accident.

translation.en: Then the Watchers, they... They came after us for snitching.
translation.fr: Les voyeurs nous ont en voulu d'avoir cafté.

translation.en: They messed with my dad's job. They leaked photos of my sister online.
translation.fr: Mon père a eu des ennuis au boulot, ils ont diffusé des photos de ma sœur.

translation.en: They stole our identities, Vee.
translation.fr: Ils nous ont volé notre identité.

translation.en: Me and Ty, we became Prisoners of the game.
translation.fr: On est devenus prisonniers du jeu.

translation.en: Oh, come on. What does that even mean?
translation.fr: Arrête. Qu'est-ce que ça veut dire ?

translation.en: It's the third category.
Watcher, Player, Prisoner.
I'm trapped.
The only way out is to win.
translation.fr: Je dois gagner pour m'en sortir.

translation.en: So you have to win.
No. No, you do.
What? Vee, you're a Prisoner now.
You and I, we're going to the final round together and I'm gonna lose.
translation.fr: Toi et moi, on va aller en finale, et je vais perdre.

translation.en: What? No, you can't do that. It's already done. It's already done.
translation.fr: - Ne fais pas ça. - C'est déjà fait.

translation.en: I told the Watchers to give me a dare
translation.fr: J'ai dit aux voyeurs de trouver un défi

translation.en: that's gonna knock Ty outta second place.
translation.fr: qui détrônera Ty de la deuxième place.

translation.en: It's gonna be me and you.
translation.fr: Ce sera entre toi et moi.

translation.en: -I have to go. -No, no, no.
Yeah, I wanna take you somewhere safe. Let's go! There has to be another way.
translation.fr: - Je dois te mettre en sécurité. - Il doit y avoir une solution.

translation.en: There isn't.
If it's not me in the finals, then it's Ty. And he'll do anything to win.
translation.fr: Si ce n'est pas moi, ce sera Ty, et il fera tout pour gagner.

translation.en: Just tell me we're gonna do this.
It's not your fault.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas de ta faute.

translation.en: I just hope she's okay.
-Hello? -[Vee] Guys, it's me.
Oh, my God! Vee, where are you?
[Vee] I'm so sorry.
Doesn't matter. I'm just glad you're okay. -All right, come on. Let's go. -[Vee] I can't.
translation.fr: - Contente que tu ailles bien. - Allons-y.

translation.en: [Sydney] What?
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas. - Quoi ? - Je dois finir.

translation.en: I have to finish this.
Are you insane?
What are you talking about?
Look, it's never gonna end.
I mean, even if they leave me alone, they're just gonna do it to somebody else.
translation.fr: Même s'ils me laissent tranquille, ils feront ça à quelqu'un d'autre.

translation.en: We can't stop the game if we wanted to. There's no one to stop.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas arrêter le jeu.

translation.en: It's just a bunch of anonymous people.
What if they weren't anonymous?
[Vee] Ian's doing a dare that would put him in the finals. So it could be me against him.
translation.fr: Ian va tenter un défi pour la finale. Ce sera lui contre moi.

translation.en: [Sydney] Vee, do you actually trust this guy?
He is the person who got you into this mess in the first place.
translation.fr: C'est lui qui t'a mis dans ce pétrin.

translation.en: I got me into this mess.
Anything Ian's doing now is to help me get out.
[Vee] I know it sounds crazy, but I can do it.
translation.fr: VA SUR LE TOIT C'est dingue, mais je peux y arriver avec votre aide.

translation.en: I just need your help.
translation.fr: C'est dingue, mais je peux y arriver avec votre aide.

translation.en: What do you need us to do?
Tommy, you said the game is open source, right?
Do you think you can change the code? [Tommy] It's gonna take time.
translation.fr: - Tu pourrais changer le code ? - Ça prendra du temps.

translation.en: [Vee] Syd, could you buy us some?
translation.fr: Syd, tu peux nous faire gagner du temps ?

translation.en: Hey. Now climb the crane.
Syd? Yeah?
Use a payphone.
[male computer] Hang for five seconds.
Hang for five seconds.
Hang with one hand. Hang with one hand.
[Ian] Shit!
One! Two! Three!
Four! Five!
[Hacker Kween] Yeah, it's over here, Tommy. We don't have a lot of time.
translation.fr: Amène-toi, Tommy. On n'a pas beaucoup de temps.

translation.en: Okay, yeah. We're on our way. We'll see you soon. How did it go?
translation.fr: Oui, on arrive tout de suite. Ça s'est bien passé ?

translation.en: It went. It went?
Yeah. I think it's gonna work.
Yeah, better work.
What is this place?
Fastest Internet in New York City.
translation.fr: La connexion la plus rapide de New York.

translation.en: Hey, Tommy!
[Hacker Kween] Let's get this started. You ready? -Is the botnet up and running? -Yeah, of course.
translation.fr: - Commençons. Prêt ? - Le botnet est paré ?

translation.en: We just gotta enter it into the system.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. On n'a plus qu'à l'entrer dans le système.

translation.en: Oh, and this is Sydney. Obviously.
[Sydney] Hey. [Hacker Kween] Hey. Welcome to the cloud.
translation.fr: C'est Sydney, évidemment. Bienvenue. Dommage que tu te sois fait éliminer.

translation.en: Sucks you got axed.
translation.fr: Bienvenue. Dommage que tu te sois fait éliminer.

translation.en: All right. Let's take this game down.
[Sydney] Okay, how's this gonna work?
It's like Wikipedia, where anyone can edit the code
translation.fr: Comme Wikipedia. N'importe qui peut changer le code, mais la majorité doit l'approuver.

translation.en: but the majority has to approve it.
translation.fr: N'importe qui peut changer le code, mais la majorité doit l'approuver.

translation.en: And then the botnet can outvote everyone.
translation.fr: Le botnet peut battre tout le monde.

translation.en: Yo, I got a army of bots here waitin' for orders.
translation.fr: J'ai une armée qui attend les ordres.

translation.en: -Hey, Nancy. -[Nancy] Where is Vee? What is this game?
translation.fr: - Salut, Nancy. - Où est Vee ? C'est quoi, ce jeu ?

translation.en: [Tommy] Don't worry, she's okay. I want you to explain it to me.
translation.fr: - Ne vous en faites pas, elle va bien. - Explique-moi.

translation.en: I'm gonna give you an address.
translation.fr: Je vais vous donner une adresse.

translation.en: Okay, if you meet me here, I'll explain everything.
[man] Ticket?
Better hurry up.
Guys, it's starting!
[male computer] Players, stop!
Back up.
All right, how many bots do we got in?
Not enough yet, but we are getting there.
translation.fr: Pas assez, mais on y arrive.

translation.en: [male computer] Players, show us your weapons.
translation.fr: DERNIÈRE MANCHE Joueurs, montrez vos armes.

translation.en: First to shoot wins.
Twenty seconds on the clock.
Twenty seconds? HK, I need backup!
translation.fr: 20 secondes ? Il me faut des renforts.

translation.en: -[male computer] Begin. -Do it.
Start by just raising your gun. Just raise your gun slowly.
translation.fr: Commence par lever ton arme. Lève-la doucement.

translation.en: Then shoot me in the shoulder. I'll be fine.
What if I miss? I don't know if I can do this.
translation.fr: Et si je rate ? Je n'y arriverai pas.

translation.en: Oh, come on! Just shut up and play the game!
Vee, you have to hurry, all right?
You have to do this! This is the only way the game can end.
translation.fr: Il faut que tu le fasses pour que le jeu s'arrête.

translation.en: And then you can walk away.
[male computer] Five, four,
three,
two, one!
I'm not doing this. Vee, don't, you can't...
I'll do it!
-Oh, shit. -They're onto us.
They're blockin' all of our foreign IPs! Tommy, do something!
translation.fr: - Ils bloquent nos IP étrangers. - Fais quelque chose.

translation.en: Did y'all miss me?
And I say we do that dare again.
With someone who's really ready to play. Yeah!
Don't do it, Ty, it's not worth it, man.
translation.fr: Arrête, ça n'en vaut pas la peine.

translation.en: -[Vee] Stop! -Whoa, whoa, back up! Whoa, whoa, whoa!
[Ty] You have lost your mind, pretty boy!
translation.fr: T'as perdu la tête, beau gosse, recule !

translation.en: -Get back! -Is this what you really want?
translation.fr: T'as perdu la tête, beau gosse, recule ! C'est ce que vous voulez ? Qu'on s'entretue ?

translation.en: For us to kill each other?
translation.fr: C'est ce que vous voulez ? Qu'on s'entretue ?

translation.en: -[all] Yeah! -Of course it's what you want!
[man] Kill 'em!
You think that takes nerve?
translation.fr: Vous pensez que ça demande du cran ?

translation.en: Why don't you take off your masks and show yourselves, huh?
translation.fr: Retirez vos masques et montrez vos visages.

translation.en: You, take off your mask.
Yeah, what's your name?
It's easy for you to be brave in a crowd!
translation.fr: C'est facile d'être courageux au milieu d'une foule,

translation.en: Hiding behind your screen names.
translation.fr: de se cacher sous un pseudonyme.

translation.en: Don't you guys see that you're all still responsible
for what happens tonight, even if you are just watching?
translation.fr: de ce qui arrivera ce soir, même si vous ne faites que regarder.

translation.en: Oh, my God! Are you really believing this bullshit?
translation.fr: Vous n'allez pas croire ces conneries !

translation.en: Play to win!
Play to win.
You guys really want one of us to die? For a game?
translation.fr: Vous voulez qu'on meure pour un jeu ?

translation.en: Then shoot me.
I dare you.
Who wants me to shoot her?
translation.fr: Qui veut que je la tue ?

translation.en: Vee, what are you doing?
Who wants me to shoot her?
translation.fr: Qui veut que je la tue ?

translation.en: Tommy, where's Vee?
-All right, calm down. -[Nancy] What is this game?
translation.fr: - Du calme. - Je veux des réponses.

translation.en: I want answers! What are you doing?
translation.fr: - Du calme. - Je veux des réponses. Qu'est-ce que tu fais ?

translation.en: You better tell me right now or I'm calling the cops.
-No! No, Nancy, calm down. -No cops.
[Ty] Do you want me to shoot her?
translation.fr: Vous voulez que je la tue ?

translation.en: -[all chanting] Shoot to kill! -Then vote "Yes." Shoot to kill!
Vote "Yes" if you want me to shoot her!
translation.fr: Votez "Oui", si vous voulez que je la tue.

translation.en: Don't listen to him! Say, "No!"
You want me to shoot her? You want me to shoot her?
translation.fr: - Dites "Non", pas "Oui". - Je la tue ? Vous voulez que je la tue ?

translation.en: [Wes] Come on, guys, "No"!
Guys, vote "No"!
You! Vote "Yes"! Vote "Yes"!
[Ty] Let me know! Vote "Yes"!
Come on! Let's have a little bit of anarchy.
All right, we're getting around them. The IPs are coming in faster now.
translation.fr: On les contourne. Les IP arrivent plus vite maintenant.

translation.en: Vee, we need to go, right now!
Oh, my God!
Okay, all right. Come on, guys. Keep going.
-[crying] Oh, my God! -No, no, no, it's...
[Ian] Vee, please! Please, please!
Do you hear me, Vee? Look at me, Vee, please!
Go.
[partygoer 1] Dude, are you getting this?
[partygoer 2] That's my real name.
No, wait, stop, stop!
My God!
[Vee] It's okay, it's okay!
Stop! It's okay. I'm okay. It's okay.
translation.fr: Non, c'est rien. Je vais bien.

translation.en: Oh, my God!
Sorry.
You were in on this?
It was her plan, man. Her friend Sydney called me.
translation.fr: C'était son idée. Sa copine Sydney m'a appelé.

translation.en: That's why I'm here.
The gun... What?
Blanks, bro.
It's fake.
Oh, my God! Oh, my God.
You scared me. You scared me.
translation.fr: - Tu m'as fait peur. - Toi aussi.

translation.en: We cool?
Yeah. We're free.
She's a badass. Watch out for her.
translation.fr: Elle déchire, cette meuf. Fais gaffe, mon pote.

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] That's it. The last Player's out. [Tommy] Did we get it?
translation.fr: - C'était le dernier joueur. - On a réussi ?

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] They're out. Think it's crashing!
translation.fr: C'est fini. Le site a planté.

translation.en: -We got it? -And Nerve is officially offline!
translation.fr: - On a réussi ? - Nerve est hors réseau !

translation.en: -Wow! We have gamed the game. -Whoo!
translation.fr: On a gagné contre le jeu.

translation.en: You guys are the dumbest smart kids I've ever met.
translation.fr: Vous êtes les intellos les plus bêtes que je connaisse.

translation.en: I'm so sorry. No, no, I'm sorry.
translation.fr: - Je suis désolée. - Non, c'est moi.

translation.en: I'm sorry for bringing you into all this.
I just wish that we could've met some other way.
translation.fr: J'aurais préféré qu'on se rencontre autrement.

translation.en: I don't.
Oh, man!
And you.
What a rock star.
[Hacker Kween] Looks like I can get all your money back.
They don't call me Hacker Kween for nothin'.
translation.fr: On ne m'appelle pas Hacker Kween pour rien.

translation.en: -Really? Thanks. -Yeah.
[Ian] Crazy first date, huh?
Is that what that was? [chuckles]
[Ian] By the way, my real name is Sam.
[Vee] Well, it's nice to meet you, Sam.
-It's nice to meet you, Vee. -[laughs]
Hey, Vee, it's 28 degrees in New York!
translation.fr: Salut, il fait -2 à New York !
